Package io.github.waileong.fcm.authentication

Class FcmJwtTokenPooledObjectFactory

java.lang.Object
org.apache.commons.pool2.BaseObject
org.apache.commons.pool2.BasePooledObjectFactory<FcmJwtToken>
io.github.waileong.fcm.authentication.FcmJwtTokenPooledObjectFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.commons.pool2.PooledObjectFactory<FcmJwtToken>
public class FcmJwtTokenPooledObjectFactory extends org.apache.commons.pool2.BasePooledObjectFactory<FcmJwtToken>
A factory for creating, wrapping, and validating FcmJwtToken objects for use in a pool. This class extends BasePooledObjectFactory and is tailored to generate JWT tokens required for authenticating with Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) services. It utilizes the credentials provided by FcmProperties.Credential to generate tokens with a specific lifetime and signs them using RS256 algorithm.

The generated tokens include information such as the issuer, subject, and audience, and are signed with a private key. This class ensures that each token is valid for a specified duration (typically one hour), and provides mechanisms to validate the tokens before they are reused from the pool.

  • Method Details

    • create

      public FcmJwtToken create() throws Exception
      Creates a new FcmJwtToken instance, signed with RS256 algorithm using the provided FCM credentials. The token is configured with an issuer, subject, audience, issuance time, and expiration time.
      Specified by:
      create in class org.apache.commons.pool2.BasePooledObjectFactory<FcmJwtToken>
      Returns:
      A new FcmJwtToken instance, ready for use.
      Throws:
      Exception - If there is an error during token creation, such as an issue with key parsing.

    • wrap

      public org.apache.commons.pool2.PooledObject<FcmJwtToken> wrap(FcmJwtToken obj)
      Wraps an FcmJwtToken instance in a PooledObject, making it suitable for pooling.
      Specified by:
      wrap in class org.apache.commons.pool2.BasePooledObjectFactory<FcmJwtToken>
      Parameters:
      obj - The FcmJwtToken instance to wrap.
      Returns:
      A PooledObject wrapping the provided FcmJwtToken.

    • validateObject

      public boolean validateObject(org.apache.commons.pool2.PooledObject<FcmJwtToken> p)
      Validates an FcmJwtToken within a PooledObject, checking if the token has expired. This ensures that only valid tokens are used for FCM authentication.
      Specified by:
      validateObject in interface org.apache.commons.pool2.PooledObjectFactory<FcmJwtToken>
      Overrides:
      validateObject in class org.apache.commons.pool2.BasePooledObjectFactory<FcmJwtToken>
      Parameters:
      p - The PooledObject containing the FcmJwtToken to validate.
      Returns:
      true if the token is still valid (not expired), false otherwise.
